headlines.description: — Jerami Grant had 31 points, 10 rebounds and a crucial assist near the end of regulation, and the Detroit Pistons beat the Phoenix Suns 110-105 in overtime after rallying from a 23-point deficit Friday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Pistons rally from 23 down, beat Suns 110-105 in OT

video.headline: Wright swings to Bey for 3-pointer in OT

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Wright swings to Bey for 3-pointer in OT) 2021/1/8 ESHEET

headlines.description: — Jayson Tatum had 32 points, Jaylen Brown had 27 points and 13 rebounds, and the Boston Celtics held off Bradley Beal and the Washington Wizards 116-107 Friday night for their fourth straight win.
headlines.shortLinkText: Tatum has 32 to help Celtics hold off Beal, Wizards 116-107

video.headline: Beal follows up 60 with a 41 spot in loss to Celtics

tracking.trackingName: COM_NBA Highlight (Beal follows up 60 with a 41 spot in loss to Celtics) 2021/1/8 ESHEET SOTFULL

events.name: Oklahoma City Thunder at New York Knicks

headlines.description: — Shai Gilgeous-Alexander had 25 points, 10 rebounds and seven assists, Hamidou Diallo scored a season-high 23 points, and the Oklahoma City Thunder overcame an ugly start to beat the New York Knicks 101-89 on Friday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Thunder start slow, end Knicks' 3-game win streak 101-89

video.headline: SGA, Diallo connect for exclamation-mark alley-oop

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (SGA, Diallo connect for exclamation mark alley-oop) 2020/1/8 ESHEET

events.name: Charlotte Hornets at New Orleans Pelicans

headlines.description: — Gordon Hayward scored 26 points and the Charlotte Hornets methodically came back from an 18-point, second-quarter deficit to beat the New Orleans Pelicans 118-110 on Friday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Hayward's 26 points pace Hornets past Pelicans, 118-110

video.headline: LaMelo puts up near triple-double vs. brother Lonzo, Pelicans

tracking.trackingName: COM_NBA Highlight (LaMelo puts up near triple-double vs. brother Lonzo, Pelicans) 2021/01/08 ESHEET SOTFULL

headlines.description: — Christian Wood scored 22 points and tied a career high with 15 rebounds to lead the Houston Rockets to a 132-90 rout of the short-handed Orlando Magic on Friday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Wood scores 22 to lead Rockets to 132-90 rout of Orlando

video.headline: Harden tees up Wood for alley-oop slam

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Harden tees up Wood for alley-oop slam) 2021/1/8 ESHEET

headlines.description: — Dillon Brooks scored 24 points and Memphis held on for a 115-110 victory over the Brooklyn Nets on Friday night after Grizzlies center Jonas Valanciunas left midway through the game due to health and safety protocols.
headlines.shortLinkText: Brooks leads Grizzlies to 1st home victory 115-110 over Nets

video.headline: Grizzlies go up for good after Clarke's and-1 bucket

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Grizzlies go up for good after Clarke's and-1 bucket) 2020/1/8 ESHEET

headlines.description: — Donovan Mitchell scored 32 points and the Utah Jazz made a franchise-record 25 3-pointers to win 131-118 at Milwaukee on Friday night and hand the Bucks their first home loss.
headlines.shortLinkText: Record 3-point night helps Jazz win 131-118 at Milwaukee

video.headline: Bogdanovic posterizing dunk closes Jazz's win

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Bogdanovic posterizing dunk closes Jazz's win) 2020/1/8 ESHEET

events.name: LA Clippers at Golden State Warriors

headlines.description: — Stephen Curry scored 38 points and the Golden State Warriors erased a big second-half deficit Friday night to beat the Los Angeles Clippers 115-105.
headlines.shortLinkText: Curry scores 38 as Warriors rally past Clippers, 115-105

video.headline: Steph's 38 fuels Warriors to comeback win vs. Clippers

tracking.trackingName: COM_NBA Highlight (Steph's 38 fuels Warriors to comeback win vs. Clippers) 2021/1/8 ESHEET SOTFULL

events.name: Chicago Bulls at Los Angeles Lakers

headlines.description: — LeBron James had 28 points, seven rebounds and seven assists, and the Los Angeles Lakers overcame the absence of two injured starters for a 117-115 victory over the Chicago Bulls on Friday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: LeBron gets 28, Lakers hold off Bulls 117-115 without Davis

video.headline: LeBron carries Lakers past Bulls with AD out

tracking.trackingName: COM_NBA Highlight (LeBron carries Lakers past Bulls with AD out) 2021/01/08 ESHEET SOTFULL

headlines.description: — Pascal Siakam had 17 points, 11 assists and nine rebounds, Toronto made 20 3-pointers and the Raptors set a franchise record for scoring while winning for the second time this season, 144-123 over the Sacramento Kings on Friday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Raptors set franchise scoring record, win 144-123 over Kings

video.headline: VanVleet drops 34 points in comeback win vs. Kings

tracking.trackingName: COM_NBA Highlight (VanVleet drops 34 points in comeback win vs. Kings) 2021/1/8 ESHEET SOTFULL
